name: energetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 having or involving a lot of energy: an energetic young woman I tried aerobics but it was too energetic for me. Synonym
dynamic (FULL OF ENERGY)Opposite
lethargic
More examplesFewer examplesHe's very energetic, isn't he, for a man of his age?See how the artist has applied the paint using big, swirling, energetic brushstrokes.The gorilla swung from one side of the cage to the other in one sudden, energetic movement.The dancers gave an energetic, thrilling and polished performance which delighted everyone in the audience.The outdoor centre organizes lots of energetic activities for the kids, like cycling and canoeing.
